headline: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Valuation Check As Q4 2025 Earnings And Venezuela Oil Shifts Draw Focus
summary: The upcoming Q4 2025 earnings announcement for Marathon Petroleum (MPC) and fresh geopolitical shifts involving Venezuela have put the refiner back in focus for investors watching heavy crude exposure and Gulf Coast refining economics. See our latest analysis for Marathon Petroleum. Marathon Petroleum’s share price has eased back from recent highs to around US$176.17, with a 7 day share price return of 6.68% following the Venezuela developments. headline: Trump pushes for $100 billion in oil investments in Venezuela while Exxon and others say it’s currently ‘uninvestable’ without major reforms
summary: Oil giants tell Trump they need stability and considerable legal and political reforms before investing big in Venezuela.
